xeus.jcl

Class AbstractClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • xeus.jcl.AbstractClassLoader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JarClassLoader

    public abstract class AbstractClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader
    Abstract class loader that can load classes from different resources
    Author:
    Kamran Zafar
